input.sentences: it was there first day riding .
the animals were a bit small but so were they .
the parent taught them the correct style of riding .
everyone had a great meal after the lesson .
output.sentences: plump toddler eyes wide in anticipation
whilst a sheep in the yard stands still near the fence he is tethered to watching
a young boy ride by on the back of a horse
another toddle sees the horseback rider
but another youngster could care less, instead he tries to eat his food by smearing it on his face first.
